TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_pwn_balunga, title = balunga, year = 2024, month = December, day = 7, note = {In Wikipedia [Paiwan]}, url = {https://pwn.wikipedia.org/wiki/balunga} }

S.FORM: == balunga == 船 maazih ku balunga i teban nu bayu. siwkay nu balulu tinaku a kamu makabalunga 搭船 makabalunga kaku tayza i Butud. misabalunga 造船 matineng misabalunga ku i Butuday a tatama. misabalungaay 造船的 u misabalungaay ku acawa nu maku. pabalunga 划船 pabalunga tayza i Butud. pabalungaay 划船的；船駕駛 manamuh kaku tu pabalungaay. . u sulit nu Hulam atu Amilika Watercraft or vessel are water-borne vehicles including ships, boats, hovercraft and submarines. Watercraft usually have propulsive capability and hence are distinct from a simple device that merely floats, such as a log raft.

== balonga == 船 maazih ko balonga i teban no bayo. siwkay no balolo tinako a kamo makabalonga 搭船 makabalonga kako tayza i Botod. misabalonga 造船 matineng misabalonga ko i Botoday a tatama. misabalongaay 造船的 o misabalongaay ko acawa no mako. pabalonga 划船 pabalonga tayza i Botod. pabalongaay 划船的；船駕駛 manamoh kako to pabalongaay. . o solit no Holam ato Amilika Watercraft or vessel are water-borne vehicles incloding ships, boats, hovercraft and sobmarines. Watercraft osoally have propolsive capability and hence are distinct from a simple device that merely floats, soch as a log raft.
